text.name: info4
text.text: Memory: 8 KB SRAM and 8 KB video RAM

text.name: info9
text.text: The Game Boy is an 8-bit handheld video game console. It is the

text.name: info10
text.text: first handheld console in the Game Boy line. It was the first

text.name: info11
text.text: handheld game to use video game cartridges since the Microvision.
